name: Never use PS and VP1 login to develop - Record Query (PeopleSoft)
associatedValueName: Name of the Development Login used for the last update
description: Identify each object that has been moodified with the login PS or VP1
output:
This report lists all the Records Query last updated with PS or VP1 login.
It provides the following information: 
- Record Query full name.
- The associated value is the name of the Development Login.
rationale: The delivered PeopleSoft logins, such as PS, VP1, should not be used to develop. A specific login has to be created and used to identify precisely who has modified the object.
